item.title: Inside the Linux Kernel
item.author: Unknown
item.description: Ever wondered how Linux really works at its core? Explore the internal architecture of the Linux kernel — from its process scheduler and virtual memory to device drivers and system calls. Discover how a modular monolithic design powers billions of devices across platforms, and why this open-source marvel is so crucial in today's tech landscape.

item.title: AWS and Linux
item.author: Unknown
item.description: This blog post explores how Linux and AWS work together, with real-world insights and tips on using them effectively.
